tools.name: analyze_ticker_full
tools.description: Deep technical analysis of a single stock. Returns Diamond status, Weinstein stage, VCP, RS, institutional flow, RSI, SMAs, support/resistance.

tools.name: run_diamond_screen
tools.description: Scan the market or a batch of tickers for Diamond-status setups. Whole-market cache scan if no tickers specified.

parameters.index: string (optional) — sp500, nasdaq, russell2000, or both (default: both)

tools.name: get_market_pulse
tools.description: Returns macroeconomic market regime: BULLISH/CAUTION/BEARISH with a 0-100 score based on SPY vs SMA20/50/200.

tools.name: run_risk_audit
tools.description: Audits portfolio positions for drawdown risk. Alerts if any ticker is down >10% from recent high.

_note: This file is the contract between alpha-mcp and the fine-tuned model. When new tools are added to server.py, update tool_schemas.py AND this file, then regenerate data and retrain.
